pkgmetadata.longdescription: Topic-Specific Diagnostics for LDA and CTM Topic Models // Calculates topic-specific diagnostics (e.g. mean token length, exclusivity) for Latent Dirichlet Allocation and Correlated Topic Models fit using the 'topicmodels' package. For more details, see Chapter 12 in Airoldi et al. (2014, ISBN:9781466504080), pp 262-272 Mimno et al. (2011, ISBN:9781937284114), and Bischof et al. (2014) arXiv:1206.4631v1.
